reviews.review: Fun, fast paced, survival game that you can play with friends or by yourself, progressions not too bad just complete dailies and itll make your life soo much easier for leveling characters.

If you are a salty as fuck maggot that likes to rage after every match, then please accept my humble welcome to this dark corner of the gaming world. If you are not, then fuck off and forget about this game. This gaming community is not for pussies.
its a good time killer and the characters are well thought of

[h1]Well, hello, friend![/h1]

if you read this, I want to talk about the fact that the game is really beautiful, from the very first reviews I wanted to play this game, the laptop wasn‚Äôt pulling yet, I played on the minimum settings, everything was fine before, now, developers, I write specifically in English, so that it would be easier for you, I write on behalf of many players, enough, stop, do not be like EA or DICE, stop releasing new characters, just fix all the errors so that people would be comfortable playing, where is the balance? 

Why you need to have a high rank, what would a maniac start a game faster? WHY I, THE PLAYER, have to wait 30-40 minutes until the game starts, why are you? What you did with the game, start to fix it immediately, you will lose the rating, as you have lost DICE and EA by pushing paid content.

[b]1. Fix all errors when loading in the game.[/b]
[b]2. Balance, I do not know, decide something with him, in order to play for the maniac, you have to wait 50 minutes[/b]
[b]3. What is the NAT error yet? What's wrong? fix it as soon as possible, do you read reviews on your game at all or not?[/b]

Thank you all for your attention, I will send a copy of the review by mail to you, the developers. I will wait for an answer, I won‚Äôt leave it like that.

Yes i would get this game it's awesome and good fun and with friend's. But lately the sev's have been down and i don't know if that mean's the game is dieing or what but you wait like 20 min's sometime's and most of the time now it just don't happen unless you play with friend's. So i'm a bit upset about this cos i have played it alot and it'ss mad fun so i would like to know whaat is going on with it. Cos if it was working perfect a couple of day's ago and i would say hell yes get it. It's wroth it and you would get into it right away. But cos of this is happening i don't know if it's going dead like friday the 13th as gone dead and by the look's of thing's so is dead by daylight. And it's sad really cos it is a fab game and a right laugh so let's just hope it kick's up again till then i would waiting cos you will pay for it and you could wait a long time to go into game or no at tall.
It's fun being toxic with friends.

I've spent too long playing this game. Rank reset is toxic, I'm rank 13 but I stopped playing and now I'm bullying people at rank 19 :/  Killers are kind of OP but thats cuz I suck :P Please don't waste your money on it, but if u do I can't say I blame you.
If anyone who ever play a horror game or tactic game before this game is both at the same time I recomended 100/100
376 hours so far, its amusing i'm not very good unlike anything else on the market at least.
I LIKE THE OVERALL GAME A LOT,BUT I FEEL LIKE IT NEEDS MORE FREQUENT UPDATES LIKE MAYBE ONCE A MONTH A BALANCE UPDATE AND EVERY 2 MONTHS A NEW KILLER AND SURVIVOR

This is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game, it has a simple gameplay, but every match is different, every players has a different essence,that makes the game unpredictable and more interesting than other games.

I recommend the game to play as 2 survivor, or Alone as a killer(with spectators), so that the best possible game fun tickles out.
the game has very good additional content via DLC`s and get every Season some Updates, Fixes and new Features.
The developers are behind, creating a timeless game, awesome job.
Excelente juego, sobre todo cuando Kharius se sacrifica por el equipo muriendo siempre siempre primero. 10/10 excelente servicio

I just don't get tired of this game. I have a great time and always want to come back for more. It's been a great purchase overall!
